content.detailedDescription:
I would like to share an incident that happened to me. i feel a short bio on me might be of interest. born and raised in west virginia. my father was a radio operator on a b-29 during wwii. his last base of assignment was alamogordo, n.M.. he was discharged in the fall of 1945. while he wasn’t in n.M. in 1947, he did have an avid interest in astronomy and aircraft; which i inherited. as a boy my dad bought me books on the stars and universe, as well as books on aircraft. 

 in 1969, i entered the usaf and became a aeromedical corpsman. my duty was to support flying personnel at my assigned base. our physicians were titled flight surgeons. i also flew air rescue, both in the states and overseas. i remember that i had a top secret clearance, but can’t recall a suffix. i do know that when stationed at hanscom field in bedford, ma, i had the opportunity to be part of the team that supported a u-2 crew, that had been temporarily assigned to our base. in europe, i had access to zulu alert. when assigned to minot afb, i frequently visited missile launch facilities, including the underground launch control module. as being part of an air rescue crew, i was required to be familiar with all operational aircraft, which i took very seriously. i spent 7 1/2 years in the air force.

 in 1966, i headed off to college at marshall university, in huntington, west virginia, living with my dad. (my mom and dad had divorced, with my mom living in oak hill, west virginia; 85 miles to the north-east of huntington.)

in september, 1966, i borrowed my dad’s sports car and went out to “see the sights”. i ended up in ashland, kentucky, which is just over the border from west virginia. being that i was only 17, i couldn’t drink, so i drove around the area. i-64 links ashland and huntington. at approximately 10:00 pm, i left ashland and headed back home. when into huntington, on i-64, i took the 5th street exit, which is where my dad lived. given that i had been driving around for a couple of hours, and had drank a number of colas, i felt the urge to relieve myself. as i drove up the 5th street exit, i pulled the car over to the shoulder, parked and stepped out to take care of business. i-64 runs east to west on the south side of the city, without the glare of city lights.

while standing beside the car, i glanced up to see a perfectly clear night, devoid of clouds. the stars shown brightly. as i gazed upward, my eye caught movement directly over my head. there, to my amazement, was a dark/black triangle shaped craft moving west to east moving at a very slow speed. i also noted that it was not making any sound. on its bottom surface, there were 3 non-blinking red lights. 

i know the object was solid, as when it moved, it block my sight of stars above it. i could not determine the altitude as i didn’t know its size. however, if it were the size of a dc-9, it would have been no more than 100 feet over my head. i watched it for maybe 20 to 30 seconds, and sat back down in the car. my feet were still outside the car and i thought to myself, that thing didn’t have any flashing lights and it wasn’t making any sound; so i immediately pulled myself back out of the car and looked skyward. nothing. the craft was gone. the time it took me to sit down and immediately stand, took no more than 5 seconds. i guesstimate that i could see at least 3 to 4 miles in all directions, yet in that amount to time, the object shot out of sight.

 i then drove home and told my dad of my experience. his reply was, “you saw something interesting”. 

the next weekend, i went to my mom’s house. my mother always fixed a sunday dinner, as she, my younger brother and i sat down to eat, she said “oh, i have a story to tell you.” last weekend, two of the ladies she worked with and my mom were driving from oak hill to charleston, with my mom driving. to get to charleston, my mom took rt.61 which passes over a series of mountains before it comes to the kanawha river where the road turns into an easy drive to charleston along the river. just as the road straighten out and the valley opened up, the lady in the passengers seat said, “look at that up in the sky.” it was on the north side of the valley, at which point, the valley, from ridge to ridge is 5 to 6 miles across. my mom glanced up to see a dark/black triangular shaped object that appeared to be stopped in the sky. after looking for only a few seconds, she looked back to the road to make sure her driving was safe, and then glanced back to the spot where she had seen the object; but it was gone. she asked the passenger where it had gone? the reply, was “...It’s on the other side of the valley.”. in the amount of time it took to look at the object, glance at the road, and back up to the object, no more than 5 seconds, the craft had moved (north to south) approximately 6 miles. the craft then sped up and in the blink of the eye, zoomed out of sight. i then told my mom of my experience, which occurred the same night. (please understand that to get from oak hill to huntington, one must go past charleston - in a west-southwest direction.)
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: Walking my wife to her car. i noticed a huge brightness with crom flash off the surface of the surface of the moon so i went to grab my camera and took plenty of images. i thought the image was something unique because it was producing tremendous amount of energy. the object moved very rapidly and seem to stop on a dime. i was very impressed and intrigued by its shape changing and movementss. i knew airplanes or other man made craft can't maneuver the way this did. because enertia will kill a human being. i watched it fade away.
content.summary: Coming off the lunar surface

content.detailedDescription: Ive given a detailed description twice on this site and it wont let me submit???????
content.summary: I was abducted 2nd time!

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a cruise from southampton (uk)to zeebrugge (belgium). on the saturday 6th may 2017 at 13.45 i took a picture of the cruise ship from inside the coach (through the window). at the time i did not notice anything in the sky.
when we got back on the ship i was going through the pictures and saw the object.
the picture was taken on a samsung s7 edge on the maximum resolution 12m.
content.summary: I took a picture of the cruise she from inside a coach. the object was not seen until i looked a the picture later.

content.detailedDescription:
So i was on my way out, looked up at any immediate star
in the sky usually the ufo is the first one.  
it got intelligent, neighbors apparently were witnessing
and signaling too.  i got my binocs my sound aid amp
and that's when i noticed the sound is so local
you may be confuse for an animal, how ever by distuingusibg 
the sound through a device it sounds like a pulse resonance
wave from a nearby craft.  people commonly mistake
them as bird sounding.

during the event it moved up, down, wobbled, flew a great deal forward
hid behind a tree like if playing peekaboo 
i had a powerfully lumens white light i signaled back
and can confirm intelligent control

after what i saw, it's like i either believe it's a bird with my sound mind
or believe it's still the sound from the craft earlier.

it's too electronic sounding to be a bird, then it's sounds natural like a bird when i mean bird i mean bigger bird sound.

if it is a bird then it's mating call has been going on constantly changing location various degrees around me.

ufos make some synthesizer like noises
and to the human ear can mimic artificially a natural sound real well.

well wouldn't that be confusing?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I'm listening to a nearby unearthly

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating ufo trailed by 3 fighter craft shortly after dissapearing. no planes on radar in area.
content.summary: Ufo chased by aircraft dissapeared shortly after noticing.

content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping outside and lying on my back and was looking at the sky, the object came over the house tops directly overhead very close it was dark and blackened out the stars. i could defineately make out the triangular shape it travelled very slow 20-30 mph no noise or emmisions i was 16 yo and made a commotion and awoke other people that were awakened and witnessed what i was seeing.
this happened before any mention of triangular space craft or ufo,s only saucer shaped objects, this object i knew was not from our planet and kept it quite because it did not fit the persona of a ufo at the time as it was triangular.
i was stunned confused and could not comprehend what i was seeing as triangular objects as far as i was concerned were never reported.
but i do know 100% it was of alien origin, and as of today somewhat concerned that ther may have been some contact with it that i am not aware of or remember as i am positive it was aware of me because it was that close.
i only lost sight when it continued in its direction over the roof tops.

it was 100% triangular outside perimeter lights about 9 in total not flashing but constant, i instantly knew it was not from here, too large too slow and no propulsion or noise. it was several hundred feet across or more.
content.summary: Observed a triangular craft late evening black with perimertor lights no noise travelling very slow passed directly over me at close distance with witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back watching the sky, looking for satellites like i normally do when all of a sudden this starlight object came from the west at a high rate of speed and turned north. took about a minute or less from the time i saws it until it was gone. i thought immediately this is not a satellite as it was traveling much faster than i have ever seen when you watch a satellite you have time to watch it go across the sky until it disappears. with this it was immediately here and gone. my feeling was i could not believe the speed of this object an was excited to see it. i lost sight of it as it continued on north as it was going so fast it was gone as quickly as it appeared.
content.summary: Starlike object came from the west and curved to the north at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 8 years old i travelled to scotland with my mother to visit my grandparents. my grandparents lived in a duplex cottage (they lived in half with another family with a 12 year old son in the other half). the cottage was on the outskirts of perth - in the countryside with a forest, river and old mill ruins behind it. it was august/september 1979 and i spent most days playing with alan - the boy who lived next door to my grandparents. we ran around in the forest generally having fun as children do but there was an event that i can honestly say changed my life. alan and i were building a hut of some kind. the day was fine and clear - i was collecting old tin and sticks but for a few seconds a solid figure appeared to me beside a tree. it was human sized and the most amazing turquoise blue...At first i thought it was like an old knight you would imagine with silver armour but it simply wasn't. it was blue, human sized and there for a few seconds. alan noticed i was a bit startled and asked if i was alright to which i replied that i thought i had seen something. he asked what i saw to which i replied that it was weird but to my surprize he said it was the blue man wasn't it. i asked alan if he saw it too to which he replied not this time but he had seen it several times previously.
i don't remember facial features or details other than it was solid, the most beautiful turquoise blue all over and adult human sized. what i do know is it was real. why it appeared i don't know but it has certainly had an effect on my life and i often wonder how many other people have seen turquoise blue figures. i have no idea where alan is now but i am back in new zealand with my eyes opened to things that don't always make sense. has anyone else seen the turquoise blue figures?
content.summary: Entity appeared to me - definitely solid and seen to me for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: We were outside and my husband noticed a orb like craft hover and pass us where it hovered or joined two other orb like crafts that seemed to be observing us and then one tried to cloak itself my husband could still make it out but i couldn't see it only the remaining two orb like crafts. they stayed just watching us for about 30 minutes until they started hovering away and disappeared rather abruptly
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw three orb like crafts that were moving and then just hovered as if looking or observing us

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to work at 4 a.M. 5/9/17  i see this light and think first it's a plane heading to the airport...But no... too early they don't land till around 6 am. so i looked closer and saw 3 lights, helicopter...No noise.. and the lights are too far apart. one in the front and two in the back,. than i saw what it looked like,.. a triangle... with a pulsating light near the middle. moving very slow, it was heading east and i was taking that turn,..And i watched best i could till the trees were gone and slowed and watched it go out of sight to the southwest.
content.summary: Saw a light, moving slowly at 4 am. it was moving very slowly,.5/10mph than went south

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, 
i remember that day because it was my last bday living in paris. 
was with friends siting on the edge of ile saint louis doing a picnic. 
i was trying my new camera and started to shoot pictures to test the screen of the camera.
after several shots i delicede to zoom on the picture i am sending to you,
i asked my friends if the could check the picture .. none of us saw a plane or heard noices around.... 
it is not my first time seeing ufos.
changing all colors and temperatures in different software i could see solid shape of  ovale.

thank you for consideration.
content.summary: 2008 unvoluntary picture of ufo with withness

content.detailedDescription: This object appeared to be planet like which stayed stationery for about ten to twenty minutes. then started to move towards us it appeared to be triangle with colored lights and the bottom appeared to have panels that were either transparent and were bright white lights. it made a humming sound but not until it was on top of us. we ran to other side of house and it was just gone.
content.summary: At first looked like a bright planet then turned into a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: i was taking out the dog and starting the truck before work and noticed a bright light in the sky.I thought at first maybe a star , a plane or something because there is a airport in the area but this thing just hovered there . so i started recording it looked as if it was pulsating when i zoomed in on it . i recorded for about a 1 minute i had to get ready for work. i was shocked and excited that i may have recorded something not of this earth and when i left for work the object was no longer there rnd 6:45.
content.summary: I was taking out the dog and starting the truck before work and noticed a bright light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in hicksville,ny on  broadway route 107 north, to my hair appointment. this shape ahead of me in the sky was just out of place, its too big to be a balloon, and the shape was to unusual to be a blimp...I got to the red light, i was sitting with the other cars, i kept staring at the object, counting off everything that it wasn't,,,when the light turned green, the traffic stayed still,unusual because this is a very busy road,so i looked over to the driver next to me , he too was  staring up at this object. after some car horns the traffic started moving. i was getting closer to the hovering object, it was sort of waving in and out of the atmosphere, but it was definitely there. next i noticed a smaller black round orb traveling towards the orange object coming from the west. (this sounds funny, but something was telling me the orange object was waiting for the black orb to catch up) i pulled over, these two objects met, the black one went around/over the orange one and then the very slowly moved across the sky to the east. at the same time a plane was travelling to the west towards jfk. i was amazed no one else was out looking at this? i got back in my car it was 11:15 am, my phone battery was charging and not yet working.(worst time ever for that phone to be dead,i cursed it) i drove towards where the objects were going, which brought me to an industrial part of town, i parked behind a building and got out to watch the two objects move slowly it seemed but, they had traveled a great distance to the east. i was amazed, but had no phone for pictures and had to get to my hair appointment at 11:30, the only way i could catch another glimpse of the pair was if i had a chopper instead of a car. about  three minutes later i arrived at the salon, parked and just as my phone came to life, a black helicopter passedto my left side, so low i could see the pilot! the chopper was completely black, no markings whatsoever, and it was coming from the eastern direction where i last saw the objects. that was weird too. i know i saw something that was not man made, i believe they were traveling ufo's until i hear different.
content.summary: I witnessed a very large orange/gold  shape in the sky,it was not a ballon or blimp.Stationary at first,then joined by a black orb. they traveled across the sky together. it was amazing!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work and about to get in my truck when i saw the object in the sky to the sw of my position. object was bright and too big to be a star or planet. it was not the moon. object seemed textured, almost like a mirror ball, and appeared about the diameter of a dime held at arms length in the sky. the object just hovered in the sky and did not move. i heard no sound other than that of traffic but i don't think the object was close to me. i had the impression it was very large but a good ways off. i watched approximately 10 minutes and then it was just gone. i never saw it move. it just wasn't there anymore.

this is very close to fort hood so it very well could be something military but i'm used to seeing transports and helicopters of all shapes and sizes. this was none of those aircraft.

it may be nothing but thought i'd send the picture your way just in case.
content.summary: Bright, seemingly solid, large object  hovering in sky sw of killeen.

content.detailedDescription: I just wanted to share this picture that my mother took in arizona a few years ago. she used film to take random pictures of scenery during a trip that my father and she were on. ater developing the pictures, she noticed some strange images. she cannot remember where in arizona she was driving. i don't think they are a reflection on the window, as some have suggested, as other pictures she took (in other areas) do not show anything similar.
content.summary: Picture in arizona taken by mother

content.detailedDescription: At the time of sighting i with my friend(helper)were working on siding chimney repair (part of hurricane sandy repairs)i was up on 40' extension latter and my helper was passing  siding panels up to me, at one point he asked me" what's that flying in the sky" . i came down the latter and we started observing large fleet of orbs, spheres flying out of the cloud, we started recording  flying orbs. the orbs were flying from west to east over the bay towards the ocean, the orbs were flying at airplane level during the sighting there were air planes flying, the orbs were flying in random order some faster some slower speeding up slowing down changing direction, altitude, some were accelerating and then stopping hovering waiting for the rest some were accelerating and then going backwards rejoining the fleet. the sighting lasted for about an hour. we were very exited and puzzled what could it be.(my friend /helper is a aviation enthusiast and can identify, name passing plane, airliner. the objects disappeared in the distance that's how we lost a sight of the fleet .That day asteroid 2012da14  was passing near earth and it could be watched on nasa website
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large fleet of flying orbs,spheres appeared to fly out of a cloud, while we were working on chimney siding repair

content.detailedDescription: Flying from ohio to florida. i forst noticed the object in tge distance. i knew right away it was a ufo. it was hidibg behind the cloud cover dhribg the flight. after i snapped the puctures it dissapeared behind the clouds. tge flight attendents told everyone to keep their window bkinds shut during the flight which was very strange.
content.summary: Good afternoon.  i was flying from ohio to florida and saw this out in the sky. trying to find out if is a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: me and my girlfriend were sitting on our back patio when we saw what appeared to be a ufo. at first it looked like a pure white bird fluttering in the sky. it then floated over fairly low in the sky in a se direction. it looked like it had a wing span at first . then as it got lower and closer it appeared to be a large sheet of plastic caught in the wind. it looked like a large plastic bag fluttering in the wind but it was bright and shiny. it continued ascending in the sky and the sunlight was reflecting off of it which made it appear metalic. it continued floating across the sky then it stayed in one spot for awhile. it continued to go up higher and higher until it looked like a star in the sky, then a pindrop until it finally went so high that it was no longer visible and totally out of sight. there was no cloud cover and the sunlight seemed to reflect brightly from the object. i tried to video the object with my phone camera and i did capture the object. the sun was so bright that it was hard for me to focus on the object with my phone. i captured some stills of the object and blew them up and enhanced them also.  i have never seen anything quite like that before!  we heard a jet in the sky about 20 mins after the sighting which was unusual since we seldom hear jets in our area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed from back patio a fluttering object which initially looked like a large white bird. it then moved se towards us and appeared to be a very large piece of plastic that had been caught in the wind. then it went up in the sky and  out of sight

content.detailedDescription: me and my girlfriend were sitting on our back patio when we saw what appeared to be a ufo. at first it looked like a pure white bird fluttering in the sky. it then floated over fairly low in the sky in a se direction. it looked like it had a wing span at first . then as it got lower and closer it appeared to be a large sheet of plastic caught in the wind. it looked like a large plastic bag fluttering in the wind but it was bright and shiny. it continued ascending in the sky and the sunlight was reflecting off of it which made it appear metalic. it continued floating across the sky then it stayed in one spot for awhile. it continued to go up higher and higher until it looked like a star in the sky, then a pindrop until it finally went so high that it was no longer visible and totally out of sight. there was no cloud cover and the sunlight seemed to reflect brightly from the object. i tried to video the object with my phone camera and i did capture the object. the sun was so bright that it was hard for me to focus on the object with my phone. i captured some stills of the object and blew them up and enhanced them also.  i have never seen anything quite like that before!  we heard a jet in the sky about 20 mins after the sighting which was unusual since we seldom hear jets in our area.

content.summary: Observed from back patio a fluttering object which initially looked like a large white bird. it then moved se towards us and appeared to be a very large piece of plastic that had been caught in the wind. then it went up in the sky and  out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I saw a man in the moon,that was a window of a space ship that was designed to look like a moon.I could see the lights eminating from a tv.Off to the side and what appeared to be a lounge chair then a man got up and raised his arms to his side and shut the window off.He could hear my mother and i talking about it.
content.summary: a regular human man in front of a light in the room. object was a large moon that appeared to be a spaceship window. the man heard got up from what appeared to be a lounge chair off to the side and shut down the window light. tv caught  in the

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from grocery store and stopped at a red light. i was looking up to the sky when i saw 3 pulsating orbs. i first thought they were flares but when they took off straight up to the sky i knew they were something different. i got a weird feeling about this sighting because it was also in the same direction as camp pendleton. from time to time you hear camp pendleton doing there training with explosives and other stuff but this was definetly something out of the norm.
content.summary: I saw 3 starlike orbs in the sky that were changing colors from red to white. they were stationary for about 45 secs then started pulsating and took off straight up to the sky at a speed that can't be possible for any human craft.

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of the landscape and i did not notice any object at the photo shoot, otherwise i would have made more photos. i noticed it at home when i zoomed in on the desktop. when zoomed in, it is clearly visible dark object of regular shape with light around it.
content.summary: dark object in the sky between the clouds. great visibility and clear sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was studying my atomic watch settings.
2. a star to the right of the moon
3. a moving light
4. slow moving wobble
5. intelligent, nonchalant, curious, cold
6. i didn't.
content.summary: Researching mufon video.

content.detailedDescription: I didn't see this ufo as i took the photo. i was taking a picture of the storm front because the clouds looked ominous. later this weekend i was going through my pictures and noticed something strange in the picture i took. i used a filter afterwards so it would stand out more. there is something there and it appears to have moved upwards and downwards during the exposure process as it left a black trail? i took the photo with my google pixel xl which has one of the best cameras in the industry and i have never seen any artifacts like this in any photos i have ever taken.
content.summary: Took at picture of storm clouds and noticed later.

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing in my yard last evening when i noticed a strange object appear over a tree line 280 degrees to the west.As the object was to far away to see with a camera i used my telescope to get a better view of it. thinking it a star at first i stared for a few seconds, until i noticed it began to move slowly up and down past the tree line as it continued west to 290 degrees, and decended. the object in question, when viewed from my telescope was multi cololred. it would change from blue to red to green to white in a split second. it repeated these patters as it went about its business. the whole ordeal lasted 7 mins
content.summary: Witnessed color changing orb while stargazing

content.detailedDescription: While exercising in this frisbee park, i looked over the tree tops here and saw at a long distance this 3 cylindrical vertical/standing ufos. they were in a formation like triangle and moved forward into the horizon. although i had my iphone, i was static and did not take a picture. i guess i saw them moving for 30 seconds and they disappeared in the back of the trees top. i run to see if i could find them, but too late. the day was the clearest ever and i am sure these were ufos. i took a picture of the tree top area. also located the type of ufo in the web and placed a white circle to represent the circle i saw around the 3 ufos. they moved together, and by the distance could me massive in size.
content.summary: 3 ufos vertical/standing cylinder with a hallow circle in the middle in formation

content.detailedDescription: While exercising in this frisbee park, i looked over the tree tops here and saw at a long distance this 3 cylindrical vertical/standing ufos. they were in a formation like triangle and moved forward into the horizon. although i had my iphone, i was static and did not take a picture. i guess i saw them moving for 30 seconds and they disappeared in the back of the trees top. i run to see if i could find them, but too late. the day was the clearest ever and i am sure these were ufos. i took a picture of the tree top area. also located the type of ufo in the web and placed a white circle to represent the circle i saw around the 3 ufos. they moved together, and by the distance could me massive in size.
content.summary: 3 ufos vertical/standing cylinder with a hallow circle in the middle in formation

content.detailedDescription: The sighting occurred eight years ago but i had never shared it before. by that the time i lived in estoril, near lisbon, in portugal. it was a clear late winter night and i was outside my house. i casually looked in the direction of land (the house was near the sea) and i saw a huge object in the shape of a disc, of bronze color , shining and slightly inclined. i realized quickly that i was seeing a ufo and thought about running home to get a camcorder but i hesitated for fear of not being on time. in that brief time, no more than ten seconds, the object quickly accelerated and disappeared into the sky. the surface of the object had a rust-like but shiny color, on the surface it appeared to be seen rivets of enormous size and had some windows along its length. i was quiet all the time. in the days that followed, i searched the internet for some information about this sighting, but i did not find anything. all these years later i decided to share the experience.
content.summary: When i realized what was happening the object rushed away
